dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 12,045 records of adult deaths from the Million Death Study (MDS), which collects and codes verbal autopsies (VAs) from India. The dataset includes narratives written by non-medical surveyors and key phrases assigned by coding physicians.
dcterms:title: Million Death Study (MDS)

dcterms:description: A corpus of English language data used to supplement the dataset with Indian English text, providing a broader linguistic context for the analysis.
dcterms:title: International Corpus of English

dcterms:description: An online medical advice forum that contains informal health-related language, used to enhance the dataset with additional text data.
dcterms:title: MedHelp

dcterms:creator: Erin K. Nichols
Peter Byass
Daniel Chandramohan

Abraham D. Flaxman

Jordana Leitao

Chalapati Rao

Philip W. Setel
dcterms:description: An international standard verbal autopsy instrument suitable for automated analysis, referenced in the context of improving cause of death classification.
dcterms:title: WHO 2016 verbal autopsy instrument
